articles.title: Renewable Energy Surpasses Coal in Historic Global Power Shift
articles.summary: **Renewable energy** has overtaken **coal** as the world's primary electricity source in the first half of 2025, according to think tank **Ember**. The growth in **solar** and **wind** power met all additional electricity demand while reducing fossil fuel dependence.
